author: VinInn
body:
This PR introduced <strike>three</strike> two changes:
1) uses a 99.9% instead of 99.5% Filter for BPIX1 L1
2) For all other layers uses a Filter trained w/o L1
<strike>3) For Quadruplets apply filter to hits 2,3,4 instead of 1,2,3</strike>


For performances please look to next posts
title: Tune Pixel Cluster Shape Filter to mitigate BPIX1 inefficiency
